summary: Add Juggernaut mask from the well known game DOTA 2 to the game, download and check it
descriptionHtml:
JUGGERNAUT MASK
[size=6]______________________

[/size]
[size=4]This is my first Mod, and even my first try for designing
I admit that I'm a beginner at this but I really appreciate your opinion
like give me notes and help me to improve
I like dota 2 so I made this Mask, its more like a helmet in skyrim now. :D
It took me some times But I started it with zero knowledge in design and modding [/size]I hope you like it

_____________

[size=6]Location[/size]

[size=4]Can be found in Whiterun behind Warmaiden's house in a Chest[/size]

[size=6]_____________

Install
[/size]
[size=4]Download the files and extract them into the Skyrim data folder 

[/size]

[size=6]____________
[/size]
[size=6]More[/size]

[size=4]this is only just a try for modding
I'm hopping to finish the full set
your [/size][size=4]ENDORSE[/size][size=4] and support helps me
Thanks[/size]
author: Danahishmat
